texto: Artificial intelligence is rapidly transforming various industries, including healthcare, finance, and transportation. In the medical field, AI-powered algorithms assist doctors in diagnosing diseases more accurately and quickly. Financial institutions use AI to detect fraudulent transactions and optimize investment strategies. Meanwhile, self-driving cars rely on AI to navigate roads safely. As AI continues to evolve, experts emphasize the importance of ethical considerations and regulations to ensure its responsible use.
